candidates.description: Button with text 'Open Confirmation Dialog' under the 'Information Overlay'. It is an interactive element that matches the intent of opening a modal or dialog.
Button with text 'Show Confirmation' labeled as part of the 'Dropdown Menus' section. It is an interactive element used to trigger actions within dropdowns.
Button with text 'Confirm Action' under the 'Overlays' section. It is an interactive element that matches the intent of confirming actions in overlays.
Button with text 'Confirm' labeled as part of the 'Modals and Dialogs' section. It is an interactive element used to confirm modal actions.
Button with text 'Open Confirmation Dialog' under a tab ('Tab 1'). It is an interactive element that matches the intent of opening a modal or dialog within a specific tab.

actionDetails.reasoning: The most likely elements to be clicked based on the Gherkin step 'click on 'Open Simple Modal'' are those labeled as interactive and with text related to opening modals or dialogs. The elements identified have a high probability of being buttons used for these purposes.
